common_issues.title: Pieces for Developers Connectivity Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing difficulties connecting to both cloud services and local LLMs within the Pieces for Developers application. This issue may be caused by firewall settings, network configurations, or application-specific bugs. Potential solutions include verifying internet connection, adjusting firewall rules, checking proxy settings, or reinstalling the application.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

**Title:** Pieces for Developers Not Working – Cloud Service & Local LLM Issues  

**Description:**  
Hello Pieces team,  

I have been using *Pieces for Developers* for the past 1.5 months and have been very impressed with its functionality. However, for the last 2–3 weeks, the application has stopped working. Whenever I enter a prompt, I receive the following message:  

> *"I'm sorry, we're having trouble reaching our cloud services. This is likely due to an issue with your local network, such as limited connectivity. Try checking your internet connection or switching your network, then try again. If that doesn't work, please contact support."*  

I have verified my internet connection and tried switching networks, but the issue persists. Additionally, when I attempted to use a local LLM (Ollama) and different LLM aswell, I encountered the same error message, indicating that the problem is not limited to cloud services.  

I would appreciate any guidance on how to resolve this issue. If a fix is not available, I may need to uninstall the application. I have attached relevant screenshots for reference.  

**System Information:**  
- Operating System: Windows 11
- Pieces OS Version: v11.1.2
- Pieces for Developer Version: v3.3.7 
- Network Status: Stable / Switched Networks  

**Steps to Reproduce:**  
1. Open *Pieces for Developers*.  
2. Enter a prompt.  
3. Observe the error message regarding cloud service connectivity.  
4. Attempt to use a local LLM (Ollama) and receive the same message.  

**Expected Behavior:**  
The application should process prompts as expected, either via cloud services or local LLMs.  

**Attachments:**  
[Attach screenshots here] 

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/157e569c-042f-4833-aa67-2bbd2f657f1d)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/25fdf544-8465-45c2-a906-1e492d6533e4)
 

Looking forward to your assistance. Thanks!
## Pieces Support Issue Summary

**Author:** rohanrathi99

**Date:** 2025-02-16

**Problem:** Rohan is experiencing issues with:

* Accessing Pieces cloud services.
* Using local models.

**Potential Cause:** Firewall or network configuration blocking outgoing requests.

**Action Taken:**

* Pieces Support Bot offered help and provided relevant resources.
* Mark from Pieces support requested log files for analysis.
* Rohan uploaded the requested log files to Google Drive and shared the link.

**Current Status:**

* Rohan is awaiting further feedback from Mark after he analyzes the logs. 

**Outcome:** 

* The outcome is currently unknown and will depend on the analysis of the logs and the proposed solution.

recommendations: Investigate and address the root cause of the connectivity issues reported in ticket #631, as it's impacting users' ability to connect to both cloud services and local LLMs.
Develop troubleshooting documentation or FAQs specifically related to connectivity issues, firewall settings, and network configurations for the Pieces for Developers application.
Consider implementing in-app diagnostics or network connectivity checks to help users identify and resolve potential issues more effectively.
Monitor support channels for any increase in similar connectivity issues, which could indicate a broader problem requiring urgent attention.
Review and update firewall rules and network configuration guidelines provided to users to ensure they are accurate and up-to-date.
